content.text: The sync failed due to a Python version constraint issue. The project requires Python >=3.8, but flake8 needs Python >=3.8.1. Let me check the pyproject.toml to fix this:

file.content:
[project]
name = "myrhutils"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "GitHub workflow utilities for llama-stack development"
authors = [
    {name = "Your Name", email = "your.email@example.com"}
]
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.8"
dependencies = [
    "PyGithub>=1.59.1",
    "requests>=2.31.0",
    "click>=8.1.7",
    "rich>=13.7.0",
    "python-dotenv>=1.0.0",
    "gitpython>=3.1.40",
    "pyyaml>=6.0.1",
]

[project.scripts]
gh-workflow = "myrhutils.cli:main"

[project.optional-dependencies]
dev = [
    "pytest>=7.0.0",
    "black>=23.0.0",
    "isort>=5.12.0",
    "flake8>=6.0.0",
]

[build-system]
requires = ["hatchling"]
build-backend = "hatchling.build"

[tool.black]
line-length = 88
target-version = ['py38']

[tool.isort]
profile = "black"
multi_line_output = 3

toolUseResult.originalFile:
[project]
name = "myrhutils"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "GitHub workflow utilities for llama-stack development"
authors = [
    {name = "Your Name", email = "your.email@example.com"}
]
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.8"
dependencies = [
    "PyGithub>=1.59.1",
    "requests>=2.31.0",
    "click>=8.1.7",
    "rich>=13.7.0",
    "python-dotenv>=1.0.0",
    "gitpython>=3.1.40",
    "pyyaml>=6.0.1",
]

[project.scripts]
gh-workflow = "myrhutils.cli:main"

[project.optional-dependencies]
dev = [
    "pytest>=7.0.0",
    "black>=23.0.0",
    "isort>=5.12.0",
    "flake8>=6.0.0",
]

[build-system]
requires = ["hatchling"]
build-backend = "hatchling.build"

[tool.black]
line-length = 88
target-version = ['py38']

[tool.isort]
profile = "black"
multi_line_output = 3

content.text:
The `gh-workflow status` command ran successfully and displayed comprehensive information about the `meta-llama/llama-stack` repository, including:

**Repository Statistics:**
- 7,908 stars, 1,099 forks
- 232 open issues
- Python repository created June 25, 2024

**Recent Pull Requests (15 shown):**
- Most recent: PR #2745 for dynamic model registration (r3v5)
- Various features, fixes, and chores from different contributors

**Recent Issues (19 shown):**
- Mix of bugs, enhancements, and feature requests
- Recent activity around server configuration, vector stores, and model registration
